Key.Original: Acknowledged, we'll have to try and head them off later. Out.
Key.Chinese: 明白了，我們等會兒會試著截住他們。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白了，我们等会儿会试着截住他们。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Just passed a small FIA patrol - we didn't stop, on account of our main objective, over.
Key.Chinese: 剛剛遇見了一小支自由陣線巡邏隊-我們沒停下，考慮到主要任務，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚刚遇见了一小支自由阵线巡逻队—我们没停下，考虑到主要任务，完毕。

Container.name: 056_eve_fia_report_out
Container.situation: the player concludes radio transmission, after contacting hq.

Key.Original: Good work. Logging your co-ordinates - stay on task, we'll search the bodies later, out.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好。上傳你的坐標-繼續執行任務，我們一會兒來找屍體。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好。上传你的坐标—继续执行任务，我们一会儿来找尸体。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Just eliminated a small FIA patrol.
Key.Chinese: 我們剛幹掉一小支自由陣線巡邏隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们刚干掉一小支自由阵线巡逻队。

Container.name: 055_eve_fia_report_in
Container.situation: the player eliminates fia guerrillas and contacts hq.

Key.Original: Send your traffic, Ares.
Key.Chinese: 說吧，"阿瑞斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 说吧，"阿瑞斯"。

Key.Original: Pantheon, come in, it's Ares, over.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，請回答，這是"阿瑞斯"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，请回答，这是"阿瑞斯"，完毕。

Container.name: 054_eve_fia_contact
Container.situation: the player encounters fia guerrillas.

Key.Original: Contact!
Key.Chinese: 接敵!
Key.Chinesesimp: 接敌！

Container.name: 053_eve_support_nyx_k_kill
Container.situation: the supporting vehicle is destroyed.

Key.Original: Hermes, you copy?
Key.Chinese: "赫爾墨斯"，你收到了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "赫尔墨斯"，你收到了吗？

Key.Original: Hermes! Ah, shit.
Key.Chinese: "赫爾墨斯"!啊見鬼。
Key.Chinesesimp: "赫尔墨斯"！啊见鬼。

Key.Original: Argh! Argh!
Key.Chinese: 啊!啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊！啊！

Container.name: 052_eve_support_nyx_m_or_f_kill_out
Container.situation: player acknowledges a message from the supporting vehicle which has been damaged.

Key.Original: I hear you, find some cover. We can still do this. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我聽到了，就地找掩護。我們還能完成任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听到了，就地找掩护。我们还能完成任务。通话完毕。

Container.name: 051_eve_support_nyx_f_kill
Container.situation: supporting vehicle informs player that it cannot fire.

Key.Original: Ares, it's Hermes.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"，這是"赫爾墨斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"，这是"赫尔墨斯"。

Key.Original: Our main cannon just got hit, we're gonna take it to 'em on foot.
Key.Chinese: 我們的主炮剛挨了一下，我們得徒步執行任務了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的主炮刚挨了一下，我们得徒步执行任务了。

Container.name: 050_eve_support_nyx_m_kill
Container.situation: supporting vehicle informs player that it is immobile.

Key.Original: Ares, it's Hermes, we can't move...
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"，這是"赫爾墨斯"，我們動不了了...
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"，这是"赫尔墨斯"，我们动不了了...

Key.Original: Nothing for it, we're gonna have to abandon stations and take it to 'em on foot.
Key.Chinese: 沒辦法了，我們只能棄車徒步走了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没办法了，我们只能弃车徒步走了。

Container.name: 049_eve_support_nyx_close
Container.situation: supporting vehicle informs player that it is nearby.

Key.Original: Ares, it's Hermes.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"，這是"赫爾墨斯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"，这是"赫尔墨斯"。

Key.Original: We're approaching the village, out.
Key.Chinese: 我們在接近村子了，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在接近村子了，通话完毕。

Container.name: 048_eve_support_inf_casualties_heavy
Container.situation: supporting infantry report that they have taken heavy casualties.

Key.Original: I dunno if we can take much more of this!
Key.Chinese: 我不知道我們還能頂多久!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道我们还能顶多久！

Key.Original: Just hold on, we're gaining ground!
Key.Chinese: 頂住!我們正在推進!
Key.Chinesesimp: 顶住！我们正在推进！

Container.name: 047_eve_support_inf_casualties_light
Container.situation: supporting infantry report that they have taken light casualties.

Key.Original: Apollo to Ares, could use your help over here!
Key.Chinese: "阿波羅"叫"阿瑞斯"，能不能過來幫幫忙!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿波罗"叫"阿瑞斯"，能不能过来帮帮忙！

Key.Original: Copy, just keep up that suppressive fire, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，保持壓制火力，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，保持压制火力，通话完毕。

Container.name: 046_eve_support_inf_close
Container.situation: supporting infantry inform player that they are nearby.

Key.Original: Ares, Apollo.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"，"阿波羅"叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"，"阿波罗"叫。

Key.Original: Check your targets, we're moving in from the east, out.
Key.Chinese: 注意你的目標，我們在從東部進入，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意你的目标，我们在从东部进入，通话完毕。

Container.name: 045_eve_earthquake
Container.situation: player experiences earthquake.

Key.Original: You feel that?
Key.Chinese: 你感覺到了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你感觉到了吗？

Key.Original: Yup, earthquake.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，地震了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，地震了。

Key.Original: Haven't had one of those in - what? Five, six years, maybe.
Key.Chinese: 大概得-唔?五六年沒有過了吧，大概。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大概得—唔？五六年没有过了吧，大概。

Container.name: 044_eve_earthquake_alone
Container.situation: player experiences earthquake.

Key.Original: Shit, that's a new one.
Key.Chinese: 該死，又來一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，又来一次。

Container.name: 043_su_support_nyx
Container.situation: player signals for supporting nyx to begin the attack.

Key.Original: Ares to Hermes, go! Strike fast and secure the village.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"叫"赫爾墨斯"，上!快速攻擊奪取村子。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"叫"赫尔墨斯"，上！快速攻击夺取村子。

Key.Original: Roger, Ares, we're on our way! Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"阿瑞斯"，我們上路了!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿瑞斯"，我们上路了！通话完毕。

Container.name: 042_su_support_inf
Container.situation: player signals for supporting infantry to begin the attack.

Key.Original: Affirmative, we're oscar mike, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們在移動了，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们在移动了，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Ares to Apollo, begin your assault!
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"叫"阿波羅"，開始突擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"叫"阿波罗"，开始突击！

Container.name: 041_eve_rearm
Container.situation: player contacts hq regarding rearmament.

Key.Original: That's affirmative, Ares. Bring her in, we'll see to it, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"阿瑞斯"。把它開回來吧，我們會照看它的，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿瑞斯"。把它开回来吧，我们会照看它的，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Pantheon, it's Ares, running low on ammo. Request permission to RTB and rearm, over.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，這是"阿瑞斯"，沒彈藥了。請求許可返回基地補給彈藥，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，这是"阿瑞斯"，没弹药了。请求许可返回基地补给弹药，完毕。

Container.name: 040_eve_repair
Container.situation: player contacts hq regarding repairs.

Key.Original: Return to base. There's an engineer ready at the depot, out.
Key.Chinese: 返回基地。補給站附近有個工兵在等著了，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回基地。补给站附近有个工兵在等着了，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Pantheon, Ares. Gonna need repairs! Over.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，"阿瑞斯"叫。需要維修!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，"阿瑞斯"叫。需要维修！完毕。

Container.name: 039_eve_refuel
Container.situation: player contacts hq regarding fuel.

Key.Original: Solid copy, head back to camp. Out.
Key.Chinese: 明白，返回營地。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，返回营地。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Pantheon, this is Ares. Bingo fuel. Over.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，這是"阿瑞斯"。燃料見底。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，这是"阿瑞斯"。燃料见底。完毕。

Container.name: 038_eve_player_injured
Container.situation: player is injured.

Key.Original: Argh!
Key.Chinese: 啊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊！

Key.Original: Motherfucker!
Key.Chinese: 他媽的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的！

Container.name: 037_ta_village_captured_out
Container.situation: hq concludes the transmission, adding a medevac is inbound.

Key.Original: Consolidate your position and await further orders. We'll arrange for a MEDEVAC, out.
Key.Chinese: 固守陣地等待進一步命令。我們會安排撤離的，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 固守阵地等待进一步命令。我们会安排撤离的，通话完毕。

Container.name: 036_in_hunter_consequences_dead
Container.situation: player is informed that the suspected insurgent was a civilian and that they did the wrong thing.

Key.Original: Oh, and by the way.
Key.Chinese: 哦，順便一說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，顺便一说。

Key.Original: Those locals? Bad call... they were hunters - not insurgents.
Key.Chinese: 那些當地人?糟透了...他們是獵人-不是叛軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些当地人？糟透了...他们是猎人—不是叛军。

Container.name: 035_in_hunter_consequences_alive
Container.situation: player is informed that the hunter was indeed a civilian and that they did the right thing.

Key.Original: Fortunately, those locals?
Key.Chinese: 幸運的是，那些當地人?
Key.Chinesesimp: 幸运的是，那些当地人？

Key.Original: They were hunters - not insurgents.
Key.Chinese: 他們是獵人-不是叛軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们是猎人—不是叛军。

Container.name: 034_ta_village_captured_terrible_out
Container.situation: hq concludes the transmission. friendlies and civilians were injured, and the hunter was killed.

Key.Original: Oh, and by the way.
Key.Chinese: 哦，順便一說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，顺便一说。

Key.Original: Those locals? Bad call... they were hunters - not insurgents.
Key.Chinese: 那些當地人?糟透了...他們是獵人-不是叛軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些当地人？糟透了...他们是猎人—不是叛军。

Key.Original: A MEDEVAC's inbound.
Key.Chinese: 救傷直升機馬上就到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 救伤直升机马上就到。

Key.Original: I'd start thinking about how you're going to explain this, Captain.
Key.Chinese: 我開始考慮你該怎麼跟我解釋這一切了，上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我开始考虑你该怎么跟我解释这一切了，上尉。

Key.Original: Ah, fuck.
Key.Chinese: 啊操。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊操。

Key.Original: Consolidate your position and await further orders. Out.
Key.Chinese: 堅守你的位置等待進一步命令。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚守你的位置等待进一步命令。通话完毕。

Container.name: 033_ta_village_captured_perfect_out
Container.situation: hq concludes the transmission. no friendlies or civilians were injured at all.

Key.Original: You live up to your reputation, Captain - well done.
Key.Chinese: 你真是恪盡職守，上尉-幹得好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你真是恪尽职守，上尉—干得好。

Key.Original: Oh, and those locals? It's like you said.
Key.Chinese: 哦，至於那些當地人?如你所說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，至于那些当地人？如你所说。

Key.Original: They were hunters - not insurgents.
Key.Chinese: 他們是獵人-不是叛軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们是猎人—不是叛军。

Key.Original: Consolidate your position and await further orders, out.
Key.Chinese: 堅守你的位置等待進一步命令，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 坚守你的位置等待进一步命令，通话完毕。

Container.name: 032_ta_village_captured_civilians_heavy
Container.situation: player states civilians were heavily injured.

Key.Original: Sounds like the guerrillas just won a propaganda coup, Captain.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來游擊隊剛剛贏得了一場宣傳戰，上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来游击队刚刚赢得了一场宣传战，上尉。

Key.Original: Yeah, CIVPOP definitely didn't come off too well.
Key.Chinese: 是的，的確是沒能避開平民。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，的确是没能避开平民。

Container.name: 031_ta_village_captured_civilians_light
Container.situation: player states some civilians were injured.

Key.Original: Ergh, understood.
Key.Chinese: 呃，瞭解。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，了解。

Key.Original: Some.
Key.Chinese: 一些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一些。

Key.Original: Few unfortunates were caught in the crossfire.
Key.Chinese: 個別不走運的被捲入了交叉火力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 个别不走运的被卷入了交叉火力。

Container.name: 030_ta_village_captured_civilians_none
Container.situation: player states no civilians were injured.

Key.Original: Copy, understood.
Key.Chinese: 收到，明白。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，明白。

Key.Original: Negative.
Key.Chinese: 沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有。

Container.name: 029_ta_village_captured_civilians
Container.situation: hq asks about civilian casualties.

Key.Original: Roger. Any collateral damage? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。有連帶損傷嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。有连带损伤吗？完毕。

Container.name: 028_ta_village_captured_heavy
Container.situation: player gives a casualty report. heavy casualties were sustained in the engagement.

Key.Original: Gotta lot of wounded - another half a dozen KIA. Maybe more.
Key.Chinese: 有很多受傷的-還有五六個被打死了。可能更多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有很多受伤的—还有五六个被打死了。可能更多。

Container.name: 027_ta_village_captured_light
Container.situation: player gives a casualty report. light casualties were sustained in the engagement.

Key.Original: One or two wounded, maybe. A couple of others KIA.
Key.Chinese: 一兩個受傷的，大概。還有兩三個陣亡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一两个受伤的，大概。还有两三个阵亡了。

Container.name: 026_ta_village_captured_none
Container.situation: player gives a casualty report. no one was injured.

Key.Original: No casualties our end, guess we got lucky on this one.
Key.Chinese: 我方沒有傷亡，我猜這次比較走運。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我方没有伤亡，我猜这次比较走运。

Container.name: 025_ta_village_captured_na
Container.situation: player gives a casualty report. no one was injured because no supports were used.

Key.Original: No casualties to report, we went in alone.
Key.Chinese: 沒有可報告的傷亡，我們是自己闖進來的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有可报告的伤亡，我们是自己闯进来的。

Key.Original: Speed made more sense than numbers.
Key.Chinese: 速度比數量更靠譜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 速度比数量更靠谱。

Container.name: 024_ta_village_captured_in
Container.situation: player contacts hq to report that the village has been captured.

Key.Original: Outstanding! CASREP.
Key.Chinese: 幹得漂亮!傷亡報告。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮！伤亡报告。

Key.Original: Pantheon, it's Ares, the village is clear. Over.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，這是"阿瑞斯"，村子安全了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，这是"阿瑞斯"，村子安全了。完毕。

Container.name: 023_su_supports_available
Container.situation: player is informed that supports are available for the attack.

Key.Original: Copy that, hold your position. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，守住你的位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，守住你的位置。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Ares, this is Hermes, heard you got some action. We're in a Nyx outside Athira.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"，這是"赫爾墨斯"，聽說你們有一些行動。我們在阿西拉郊外的一輛"夜神"裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"，这是"赫尔墨斯"，听说你们有一些行动。我们在阿西拉郊外的一辆"夜神"里。

Key.Original: Ready to engage on your mark, over.
Key.Chinese: 準備聽你的命令接戰，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备听你的命令接战，完毕。

Container.name: 022_ta_village_attack
Container.situation: player is contacted by hq and informed that the deserters are at a nearby village. player is retasked and ordered to conduct reconnaissance and orchestrate an attack.

Key.Original: Ares. Pantheon.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"，"萬神殿"叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"，"万神殿"叫。

Key.Original: Listen up, we got reports coming in from Ifestiona.
Key.Chinese: 聽好，我們有來自伊費斯蒂奧納的情報
Key.Chinesesimp: 听好，我们有来自伊费斯蒂奥纳的情报

Key.Original: A dozen soldiers are requisitioning supplies there, claiming the army's going to pay for it.
Key.Chinese: 十幾個士兵在那裡徵用補給品，說軍隊會付錢的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 十几个士兵在那里征用补给品，说军队会付钱的。

Key.Original: Affirmative - divert and interdict.
Key.Chinese: 明白-轉向介入。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白—转向介入。

Key.Original: An infantry element's inserting via helo, callsign Apollo.
Key.Chinese: 一個步兵分隊正搭直升機投送，呼號"阿波羅"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个步兵分队正搭直升机投送，呼号"阿波罗"。

Key.Original: Copy, you think it's our deserters?
Key.Chinese: 收到，你覺得這就是我們的逃兵?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，你觉得这就是我们的逃兵？

Key.Original: They'll support you in your attack.
Key.Chinese: 他們會支援你的進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们会支援你的进攻。

Key.Original: As senior officer in the field, you have tactical command.
Key.Chinese: 作為現地的最高級軍官，你有戰術指揮權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 作为现地的最高级军官，你有战术指挥权。

Key.Original: If we can, we'll reroute additional forces. But, no promises. Out.
Key.Chinese: 如果可能的話，我們會再派更多的部隊去。不過不保證。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果可能的话，我们会再派更多的部队去。不过不保证。通话完毕。

Container.name: 021_eve_checkpoint_b_report
Container.situation: player recognizes that the troops at the second checkpoint have deserted. hq orders player to return to base.

Key.Original: Copy. There any chance the FIA took our boys hostage?
Key.Chinese: 收到。有沒有可能是自由陣線拿我們的人當人質?
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。有没有可能是自由阵线拿我们的人当人质？

Key.Original: Maybe they caught them by surprise?
Key.Chinese: 可能是把他們突襲了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 可能是把他们突袭了？

Key.Original: Ares to Pantheon - Observation Post Omega's gone.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"呼叫"萬神殿"-"歐米茄"觀察哨完了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"呼叫"万神殿"-"欧米茄"观察哨完了。

Key.Original: Sergeant's KIA. No signs of a firefight, no more bodies, no spent casings, nothing.
Key.Chinese: 軍士給打死了。沒有交火跡象，沒有更多的屍體，沒有彈殼，什麼都沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 军士给打死了。没有交火迹象，没有更多的尸体，没有弹壳，什么都没有。

Key.Original: Goddamn it... okay, come on back to base. Another group are en route to pick up the trail.
Key.Chinese: 該死的...好吧，回基地來。另一支分隊已經來收集證據了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死的...好吧，回基地来。另一支分队已经来收集证据了。

Key.Original: Negative. I don't think so. This is desertion.
Key.Chinese: 不。我不這麼覺得。這是叛逃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不。我不这么觉得。这是叛逃。

Key.Original: Roger, Pantheon, heading home. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"萬神殿"，回來了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"万神殿"，回来了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: So I began a conversion course and took command of one of their lighter cousins...
Key.Chinese: 因此我參加了改裝訓練，開始指揮它們的一個更輕的"表兄弟"...
Key.Chinesesimp: 因此我参加了改装训练，开始指挥它们的一个更轻的"表兄弟"...

Key.Original: My name is Kyros Kalogeros. I was born in Kavala, at the turn of the millennium.
Key.Chinese: 我名叫基羅斯·卡洛傑羅斯。我生於卡瓦拉，在世紀之交的時刻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我名叫基罗斯·卡洛杰罗斯。我生于卡瓦拉，在世纪之交的时刻。

Key.Original: At 18, I enlisted in the 1st Mechanized Regiment.
Key.Chinese: 18歲時我應徵進入第1機械化團。
Key.Chinesesimp: 18岁时我应征进入第一机械化团。

Key.Original: Of course, our tanks were no good against the guerrillas.
Key.Chinese: 當然，我們的坦克不太適合對付游擊隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，我们的坦克不太适合对付游击队。

Key.Original: I learnt to work with all kinds of tracked vehicles and gained valuable experience.
Key.Chinese: 我學習了操縱各種各樣的履帶式車輛，並且得到了寶貴的經驗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我学习了操纵各种各样的履带式车辆，并且得到了宝贵的经验。

Key.Original: Before the age of 30, I was promoted to Captain.
Key.Chinese: 在30歲之前，我被提升為上尉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在30岁之前，我被提升为上尉。

Key.Original: Repression stoked the flames of resistance and, six months later, the situation exploded.
Key.Chinese: 鎮壓激發了抵抗的火焰，六個月後，局勢終於總爆發了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 镇压激发了抵抗的火焰，六个月后，局势终于总爆发了。

Key.Original: Looking back now, during the peace, I never believed my skills would be needed.
Key.Chinese: 現在再追憶起來，在和平時期，我從未想過我的技能能有需要。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在再追忆起来，在和平时期，我从未想过我的技能能有需要。

Key.Original: But I was wrong. Corrupt politicians divided our nation, creating an enemy within.
Key.Chinese: 但我錯了。腐敗的政治家分裂了我們的國家，創造出了內部敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但我错了。腐败的政治家分裂了我们的国家，创造出了内部敌人。

Key.Original: After the Battle of Oreokastro in October, 2034, things got worse.
Key.Chinese: 在2034年10月奧雷奧卡斯特羅的戰鬥後，情況變得更加惡化。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在2034年10月奥雷奥卡斯特罗的战斗后，情况变得更加恶化。

Key.Original: An age of austerity turned to one of anger, and protests descended into violence.
Key.Chinese: 蕭條時代演變為憤怒的時代，抗議逐漸暴力化。
Key.Chinesesimp: 萧条时代演变为愤怒的时代，抗议逐渐暴力化。

Container.name: 020_ap_checkpoint_b_alone
Container.situation: player approaches second checkpoint alone.

Key.Original: Shit.
Key.Chinese: 操。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操。

Key.Original: I better see what the fuck is going on...
Key.Chinese: 我最好去看看到底特麼的發生什麼了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我最好去看看到底特么的发生什么了...

Container.name: 019_ap_checkpoint_b
Container.situation: player approaches second checkpoint.

Key.Original: Shouldn't someone be here?
Key.Chinese: 那兒不該有人嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿不该有人吗？

Key.Original: Something's off.
Key.Chinese: 有點不對勁。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有点不对劲。

Key.Original: Hang on, I'll get out. See what the fuck is going on.
Key.Chinese: 等下，我先下車。我看看究竟是特麼的怎麼了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等下，我先下车。我看看究竟是特么的怎么了。

Container.name: 018_eve_hunter_report_out
Container.situation: hq informs the player that a counter insurgency team will investigate.

Key.Original: Message received.
Key.Chinese: 信息收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 信息收到。

Key.Original: Continue to OP Omega, then RTB, out.
Key.Chinese: 繼續前往"歐米伽"觀察哨，然後返回基地。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续前往"欧米伽"观察哨，然后返回基地。通话完毕。

Container.name: 017_eve_hunter_dead_report
Container.situation: player reports to hq that they have found and killed a suspected insurgent.

Key.Original: Pantheon, it's Ares. Got a dead FIA insurgent, over.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，這是"阿瑞斯"。發現了一個死掉的自由陣線游擊隊員。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，这是"阿瑞斯"。发现了一个死掉的自由阵线游击队员。完毕。

Container.name: 016_eve_hunter_alive_report
Container.situation: player reports to hq that they have found a civilian and that the intelligence report was incorrect.

Key.Original: Pantheon, it's Ares. There's an old man here.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，這是"阿瑞斯"。那兒有個老頭兒。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，这是"阿瑞斯"。那儿有个老头儿。

Key.Original: You may wanna confirm, but I, uh. I don't think he's FIA. Over.
Key.Chinese: 你可能想要確認，但我，呃，我不覺得他是自由陣線。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可能想要确认，但我，呃，我不觉得他是自由阵线。完毕。

Container.name: 015_eve_hunter_killed
Container.situation: player encounters a hunter in a forest and kills them.

Key.Original: Guerrilla bastard.
Key.Chinese: 游擊隊賤種。
Key.Chinesesimp: 游击队贱种。

Container.name: 014_eve_hunter
Container.situation: player encounters a hunter in a forest.

Key.Original: Stop, don't shoot!
Key.Chinese: 別，別開槍!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别，别开枪！

Container.name: 013_eve_hunter_approach
Container.situation: player reports to hq about a cabin.

Key.Original: Go ahead and investigate, but watch yourself.
Key.Chinese: 前去調查一下，但是注意安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前去调查一下，但是注意安全。

Key.Original: A squad's nearby. They're coming to you, out.
Key.Chinese: 一個班在附近。他們朝你們來了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个班在附近。他们朝你们来了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Pantheon, Ares. Update. I'm at grid 139-223.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，"阿瑞斯"叫。我在坐標139-223。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，"阿瑞斯"叫。我在坐标139-223。

Key.Original: There's a cabin, with a camouflaged quad outside, over.
Key.Chinese: 那有個小屋，門口有輛刷了迷彩的全地形摩托車，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那有个小屋，门口有辆刷了迷彩的全地形摩托车，完毕。

Container.name: 012_am_checkpoint_a_report
Container.situation: player reports to hq.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Ares. We're diverting a team to assist. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"阿瑞斯"。我們現在分出一個小組協助。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"阿瑞斯"。我们现在分出一个小组协助。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Ares to Pantheon.
Key.Chinese: "阿瑞斯"叫"萬神殿"。
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿瑞斯"叫"万神殿"。

Key.Original: Checkpoint Sigma has a lead - gonna do some recon.
Key.Chinese: 西格瑪檢查站有一條線索-我們要實施偵察。
Key.Chinesesimp: 西格玛检查站有一条线索—我们要实施侦察。

Key.Original: FIA guerrillas may be hiding in the pine woods, over.
Key.Chinese: 自由陣線游擊隊員可能隱藏在松林裡，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 自由阵线游击队员可能隐藏在松林里，完毕。

Container.name: 011_ta_checkpoint_a
Container.situation: player reports to officer and completes the task.

Key.Original: Sir, we got a situation.
Key.Chinese: 長官，我們出了點問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，我们出了点问题。

Key.Original: This one, we - we stopped him about an hour ago.
Key.Chinese: 這個，我們-我們大概一個小時之前攔住了他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个，我们—我们大概一个小时之前拦住了他。

Key.Original: Sergeant?
Key.Chinese: 軍士?
Key.Chinesesimp: 军士？

Key.Original: He had a rifle, stashed in the back of his truck.
Key.Chinese: 他有一支步槍，放在卡車後斗裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他有一支步枪，放在卡车后斗里。

Key.Original: Dunno, it's an old Mk14. He says he hunts rabbits with it.
Key.Chinese: 不知道，那是支老式的Mk14。他說他用那個打兔子。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不知道，那是支老式的 Mk14。他说他用那个打兔子。

Key.Original: His uncle too.
Key.Chinese: 他叔叔也一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他叔叔也一样。

Key.Original: MIL-SPEC?
Key.Chinese: 軍標的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 军标的？

Key.Original: Claims they go shooting together...
Key.Chinese: 說他們一起去打獵...
Key.Chinesesimp: 说他们一起去打猎...

Key.Original: That offroad though? It's been seen a few times on patrol.
Key.Chinese: 那輛越野車?在巡邏中見過好幾次了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那辆越野车？在巡逻中见过好几次了。

Key.Original: Yeah, in the forest about one klick north-east of here.
Key.Chinese: 是啊，在離這兒東北大概一公里的林子裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，在离这儿东北大概一公里的林子里。

Key.Original: Really?
Key.Chinese: 真的?
Key.Chinesesimp: 真的？

Key.Original: Could be something, could be nothing. Either way, we oughta take a look.
Key.Chinese: 可能是點什麼，可能什麼都不是。不管如何，我們都去轉轉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可能是点什么，可能什么都不是。不管如何，我们都去转转。

Container.name: 010_ap_checkpoint_a_wait
Container.situation: player tells driver to wait.

Key.Original: Stay put, I'll see what's going on.
Key.Chinese: 別動，我們會看看出了什麼事情的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别动，我们会看看出了什么事情的。

Container.name: 009_ap_checkpoint_a
Container.situation: player arrives at first checkpoint and indicates that he needs to report in.

Key.Original: Okay, here we are.
Key.Chinese: 好的，我們到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们到了。

Container.name: 008_fil_conv_03
Container.situation: ambient conversation between player and his fellow crew member, driver.

Key.Original: You think they're desperate or just gettin' more audacious?
Key.Chinese: 你覺得他們是更絕望了還是更大膽了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你觉得他们是更绝望了还是更大胆了？

Key.Original: You see much action up there?
Key.Chinese: 你覺得他們行動更頻繁了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你觉得他们行动更频繁了？

Key.Original: Keep your eyes open, Corporal.
Key.Chinese: 睜大眼睛，下士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 睁大眼睛，下士。

Key.Original: COIN ops suspect the FIA are active in the day out here.
Key.Chinese: 反叛亂戰作戰部門懷疑自由陣線在這邊哪怕在白天都十分活躍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 反叛乱战作战部门怀疑自由阵线在这边哪怕在白天都十分活跃。

Key.Original: Shit.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Key.Original: After Oreokastro? Hell - I wouldn't be surprised if it were both.
Key.Chinese: 在奧雷奧卡斯特羅之後?見鬼-我覺得完全不該吃驚他們這兩樣都佔上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在奥雷奥卡斯特罗之后？见鬼—我觉得完全不该吃惊他们这两样都占上了。

Key.Original: Some.
Key.Chinese: 有點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有点。

Key.Original: Bastards got an M-kill on our Kuma.
Key.Chinese: 那些混蛋把一輛我們的"庫瑪"打到癱瘓。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些混蛋把一辆我们的"库玛"打到瘫痪。

Key.Original: AT mine, we bailed - they opened up on a 50.
Key.Chinese: 反坦克雷，我們棄車了-他們用點50機槍開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 反坦克雷，我们弃车了—他们用点50机枪开火。

Key.Original: Yeah, situational awareness, it ain't something you wanna learn the hard way. Trust me.
Key.Chinese: 是啊，態勢感知。這玩意兒可不是你想交學費的。相信我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，态势感知。这玩意儿可不是你想交学费的。相信我。

Container.name: 007_fil_conv_02
Container.situation: ambient conversation between player and his fellow crew member, driver.

Key.Original: You hear about the T-140s?
Key.Chinese: 你聽說T-140的事情了麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你听说T-140的事情了么？

Key.Original: They arrived in Pyrgos yesterday...
Key.Chinese: 它們昨天到了皮爾戈斯...
Key.Chinesesimp: 它们昨天到了皮尔戈斯...

Key.Original: CSAT drove 'em to Almyra overnight.
Key.Chinese: 廣協同盟趁夜把它們開到了阿爾米拉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协趁夜把它们开到了阿尔米拉。

Key.Original: No?
Key.Chinese: 沒啊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 没啊？

Key.Original: I guess that means training's gonna start soon?
Key.Chinese: 我猜著意味著訓練馬上就要開始了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我猜着意味着训练马上就要开始了？

Key.Original: Yeah.
Key.Chinese: 對。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对。

Key.Original: Just remember.
Key.Chinese: 不過記住。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过记住。

Key.Original: The Angara's only metal, Gekas. Men are steel.
Key.Chinese: "安加拉"不過是塊金屬，傑卡斯。人是鋼鐵。
Key.Chinesesimp: "安加拉"不过是块金属，杰卡斯。人是钢铁。

Container.name: 006_fil_conv_01
Container.situation: ambient conversation between player and his fellow crew member, driver.

Key.Original: Any idea what all the monkey work's about, sir?
Key.Chinese: 你知道那幫猴子們又搞出什麼名堂了嗎，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道那帮猴子们又搞出什么名堂了吗，长官？

Key.Original: You're fucking kidding me?
Key.Chinese: 你他媽在逗我?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你他妈在逗我？

Key.Original: Megalos and I got 'em a new carburetor just the other week!
Key.Chinese: 麥加洛斯和我前兩周剛搞到一個新化油器!
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦加洛斯和我前两周刚搞到一个新化油器！

Key.Original: Aux-comms are down at the observation post. Generator's bust.
Key.Chinese: 觀察哨的附加通信系統完蛋了。發電機燒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 观察哨的附加通信系统完蛋了。发电机烧了。

Key.Original: All due respect, sir, that's bullshit - checked it myself.
Key.Chinese: 我恭敬地說，長官，那是胡扯-我自己看過。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我恭敬地说，长官，那是胡扯—我自己看过。

Key.Original: Trouble is, those guys? They couldn't piss their way out a paper bag.
Key.Chinese: 毛病在於，那幫傢伙?全都是一幫軟蛋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 毛病在于，那帮家伙？全都是一帮软蛋。

Key.Original: Not one that worked you didn't.
Key.Chinese: 不是那個你沒看的好的機器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不是那个你没看的好的机器。

Key.Original: Yeah, poor bastards.
Key.Chinese: 是啊，可憐玩意兒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，可怜玩意儿。

Key.Original: Still, someone had to kick 'em into shape.
Key.Chinese: 即便如此，還是得有人把他們教訓出個樣子。
Key.Chinesesimp: 即便如此，还是得有人把他们教训出个样子。

Key.Original: Mm, which is why they got a CO like Salis.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，這就是他們為什麼有個薩利斯那樣的指揮官了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，这就是他们为什么有个萨利斯那样的指挥官了。

Container.name: 005_ta_nyx_inside
Container.situation: player enters the nyx 'tankette' and completes the current task. new task of getting to the checkpoint is given.

Key.Original: Yeah, all good.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，一切正常。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，一切正常。

Key.Original: Copy. Assess the checkpoint's intel and continue to the OP.
Key.Chinese: 收到。評估檢查站的情報然後繼續前往觀察哨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。评估检查站的情报然后继续前往观察哨。

Key.Original: So, we good?
Key.Chinese: 那，我們完事了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那，我们完事了？

Key.Original: Pantheon, Ares Actual.
Key.Chinese: "萬神殿"，"阿瑞斯"領隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "万神殿"，"阿瑞斯"领队。

Key.Original: Moving to CP Sigma. ETA, two mikes, over.
Key.Chinese: 前往西格瑪檢查站。抵達時間，兩分鐘，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往西格玛检查站。抵达时间，两分钟，完毕。

Key.Original: Roger that, command. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，指揮部。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，指挥部。通话完毕。

Container.name: 004_ap_nyx_close
Container.situation: player approaches a nyx 'tankette' where driver is waiting inside the vehicle.

Key.Original: Yeah, well.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，好吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，好吧。

Key.Original: Y'know what they say - it ain't all about the size.
Key.Chinese: 你知道他們怎麼說-大小什麼的無關緊要。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道他们怎么说—大小什么的无关紧要。

Key.Original: Okay, start her up.
Key.Chinese: 好了，發動吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了，发动吧。

Key.Original: Jesus, I forgot how small she is...
Key.Chinese: 耶穌啊，我都忘了她有多小了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶稣啊，我都忘了她有多小了...

Key.Original: Sure, whatever gets you through the night.
Key.Chinese: 當然，什麼不能讓你挨過晚上啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，什么不能让你挨过晚上啊。

Container.name: 003_sfx_announcement_01
Container.situation: ambient announcement over loudspeaker.

Key.Original: Lieutenant Mastori, report to Major Mavros at the TOC.
Key.Chinese: 馬斯托裡中尉，到戰情指揮部向馬伕羅斯少校報到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马斯托里中尉，到战情指挥部向马夫罗斯少校报到。

Key.Original: Lieutenant Akkakios Mastori, please return to the TOC.
Key.Chinese: 阿卡伊奧斯·馬斯托裡中尉，請回到戰情指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿卡伊奥斯·马斯托里中尉，请回到战情指挥部。

Container.name: 002_loc_no_access
Container.situation: player tries to enter the military tower but is denied access.

Key.Original: Sorry, sir.
Key.Chinese: 抱歉，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 抱歉，长官。

Key.Original: TS clearance only.
Key.Chinese: 有絕密許可權限才能過。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有绝密许可权限才能过。

Container.name: 001_int_introduction
Container.situation: player begins the mission and is prompted to collect the toolkit.

Key.Original: Prepping systems now, sir.
Key.Chinese: 正在準備系統，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正在准备系统，长官。

Key.Original: Gekas, you set?
Key.Chinese: 傑卡斯，你完事了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 杰卡斯，你完事了吗？

Key.Original: Alright. Run my station checks will ya? I'll grab a toolkit.
Key.Chinese: 好了。幫我做一下戰位檢查好嗎?我去拿個工具箱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了。帮我做一下战位检查好吗？我去拿个工具箱。

Container.name: 037_ex_zulu_gone
Container.situation: hq reports to player that zulu have been wiped out.

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Zulu, report in, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear叫"祖魯"，回話，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 叫 Zulu，回话，完毕。

Key.Original: Zulu? Papa Bear. Do you copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: "祖魯"?Papa Bear叫，你聽到了嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Zulu？Papa Bear 叫，你听到了吗？完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Victor, Zulu's non-responsive, we must assume they didn't make it.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear叫"維克多"，"祖魯"沒有響應，我們必須推定他們沒撐下來。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 叫 Victor，Zulu 没有响应，我们必须推定他们没撑下来。

Key.Original: Abort the mission - withdraw to the staging area, out.
Key.Chinese: 放棄任務-撤回集結地域，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放弃任务—撤回集结地域，完毕。

Container.name: 036_ex_fuel_leak_fail
Container.situation: player's tank destroyer runs out of fuel.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, then come on back for a resupply.
Key.Chinese: 收到，那就回來補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，那就回来补给。

Key.Original: Goddamn it, Victor!
Key.Chinese: 真該死，"維克多"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 真该死，Victor！

Key.Original: Papa Bear, it's Victor, we're outta fuel, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，這是"維克多"，我們沒油了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这是 Victor，我们没油了，完毕。

Key.Original: Leave the vehicle and return to the staging area - now! Out.
Key.Chinese: 放棄車輛返回集結地域-現在!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放弃车辆返回集结地域—现在！通话完毕。

Key.Original: Er, no, I mean, we don't have a drop, we're dead in the water here. Over.
Key.Chinese: 呃不是，我是說，我們一滴油也不剩下了。我們拋錨了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃不是，我是说，我们一滴油也不剩下了。我们抛锚了。完毕。

Container.name: 034_ex_darter_destroyed
Container.situation: hq reports that the live-feed has been destroyed.

Key.Original: This is Papa Bear, we just lost UAV surveillance. Out.
Key.Chinese: 這是Papa Bear，我們剛剛失去了無人機監視信號。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是 Papa Bear，我们刚刚失去了无人机监视信号。通话完毕。

Container.name: 035_ex_fuel_leak
Container.situation: player notices that they're losing fuel.

Key.Original: Shit.
Key.Chinese: 該死。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。

Key.Original: Fuel leak. I'll have to get out and patch it up.
Key.Chinese: 燃料洩漏。我得出去把它修好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 燃料泄漏。我得出去把它修好。

Container.name: 033_ex_left_ao
Container.situation: player leaves the area of operations.

Key.Original: Can't you read a map, Victor! Abort and RTB, you just Article 15'd your ass. out.
Key.Chinese: 你就不會看看地圖嗎，"維克多"!放棄任務返回基地，等著上軍事法庭吧，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你就不会看看地图吗，Victor！放弃任务返回基地，等着上军事法庭吧，通话完毕。

Container.name: 032_ex_leaving_ao
Container.situation: hq warns player that they are leaving the area of operations.

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Victor, where the hell are you going?
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear叫"維克多"，你他媽這是往哪兒去啊?
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 叫 Victor，你他妈这是往哪儿去啊？

Key.Original: You're leaving the AO... check your map and stay on task! Out.
Key.Chinese: 你在離開作戰地域...檢查地圖，執行任務!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在离开作战地域...检查地图，执行任务！通话完毕。

Container.name: 031_ex_win_zulu_gone
Container.situation: all friendly tanks are destroyed and player is ordered to retreat.

Key.Original: Copy, it's inbound.
Key.Chinese: 收到，它來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，它来了。

Key.Original: Nomad are moving up too, we'll send you everything we got. Stay put and hold the line, out.
Key.Chinese: "遊牧民"也在開進了，我們會派去所有力量。就地防禦守住陣地，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "游牧民"也在开进了，我们会派去所有力量。就地防御守住阵地，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Victor.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，"維克多"叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，Victor 叫。

Key.Original: Those tanks are history but, Zulu's been hit, bad! Requesting immediate CASEVAC, over.
Key.Chinese: 那些坦克被擊毀了，但是"祖魯"也中彈了，很糟!要求立刻撤出支援，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些坦克被击毁了，但是 Zulu 也中弹了，很糟！要求立刻撤出支援，完毕。

Container.name: 030_ex_yankee_gone
Container.situation: all friendly tanks are destroyed and player is ordered to retreat.

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Fall back towards the staging area at once, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，立刻撤往集結地域，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，立刻撤往集结地域，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Victor to Papa Bear, we got serious casualties!
Key.Chinese: "維克多"呼叫Papa Bear，我們傷亡很大!
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor 呼叫 Papa Bear，我们伤亡很大！

Key.Original: Yankee are combat ineffective, it's complete chaos here! Over.
Key.Chinese: 揚基失去戰鬥力了，這兒一團糟!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Yankee 失去战斗力了，这儿一团糟！完毕。

Container.name: 029_ex_aa_ignored
Container.situation: player ignores the task involving the enemy's anti-aircraft battery.

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Victor, that AA's still active, and we can't wait any longer!
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear叫"維克多"，那輛自行高炮還在工作，我們等不了了。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 叫 Victor，那辆自行高炮还在工作，我们等不了了。

Key.Original: MARUK missiles are fire-and-forget, Sergeant, not fire-or-forget! Focus on the main objective.
Key.Chinese: MARUK是發射後不管的，軍士，但可不是可以什麼都不管的!關心主要任務吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: MARUK 是发射后不管的，军士，但可不是可以什么都不管的！关心主要任务吧。

Key.Original: We'll see if we can put together an artillery strike, out.
Key.Chinese: 我們看看能不能拼出一次炮火襲擊，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们看看能不能拼出一次炮火袭击，通话完毕。

Container.name: 028_ex_rhino_lost
Container.situation: player's tank destroyer is knocked out or destroyed completely.

Key.Original: That's unfortunate, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 這很不走運，軍士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这很不走运，军士。

Key.Original: You'll have to abandon the mission.
Key.Chinese: 你得終止任務了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你得终止任务了。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Victor.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，"維克多"叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，Victor 叫。

Key.Original: Our Rhino, it's outta action! Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們的"犀牛"，沒法作戰了!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的"犀牛"，没法作战了！完毕。

Key.Original: Fall back to the staging area, out.
Key.Chinese: 撤回集結地域，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤回集结地域，通话完毕。

Container.name: 027_ex_rhino_lost_accident
Container.situation: player wrecks their tank destroyer before any fighting begins.

Key.Original: Goddamn it, Victor!
Key.Chinese: 該死的，"維克多"!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死的，Victor！

Key.Original: You can explain yourself in person.
Key.Chinese: 你得自己為自己解釋下了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你得自己为自己解释下了。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Victor.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，"維克多"叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，Victor 叫。

Key.Original: I dunno how else to say this... our Rhino's wrecked, over.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道我該怎麼說...我們的"犀牛"給撞壞了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知道我该怎么说...我们的"犀牛"给撞坏了，完毕。

Key.Original: Abort the mission and return to the staging area. Out.
Key.Chinese: 放棄任務返回集結地域，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放弃任务返回集结地域，通话完毕。

Container.name: 026_eve_goats_killed
Container.situation: player fires at a herd of goats.

Key.Original: I hate goats...
Key.Chinese: 我恨山羊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我恨山羊...

Container.name: 025_eve_goats_killed_charlie
Container.situation: player fires at a herd of goats.

Key.Original: Victor, Charlie.
Key.Chinese: "維克多"，Charlie叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor，Charlie 叫。

Key.Original: I said fire below the goats, not at 'em! Jesus, man!
Key.Chinese: 我讓你們朝山羊下方打，不是朝著山羊打!老天啊夥計!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我让你们朝山羊下方打，不是朝着山羊打！老天啊伙计！

Container.name: 024_am_win_bet_higher
Container.situation: player loses his bet with zulu.

Key.Original: Hell yeah we did!
Key.Chinese: 真他媽棒我們贏啦!
Key.Chinesesimp: 真他妈棒我们赢啦！

Key.Original: Better luck next time, huh? See you at the rendezvous, out.
Key.Chinese: 希望你下次運氣好點，嗯?集結點見啦，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望你下次运气好点，嗯？集结点见啦，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Ergh, goddamn it.
Key.Chinese: 呃，該死的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呃，该死的。

Container.name: 023_am_win_bet_equal
Container.situation: player scores the same as zulu in their bet.

Key.Original: Nope.
Key.Chinese: 沒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没。

Key.Original: But we didn't bag any less, either.
Key.Chinese: 但是我們打的也沒少啊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是我们打的也没少啊。

Key.Original: Yeah, whatever. Guess we'll see you at the rendezvous, out.
Key.Chinese: 好，隨他吧。我們在集結點見，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，随他吧。我们在集结点见，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Hell, then you boys saved more than just your asses!
Key.Chinese: 好麼，你小子們還算保住了顏面嘛!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好么，你小子们还算保住了颜面嘛！

Container.name: 022_am_win_bet_lower
Container.situation: player loses his bet with zulu.

Key.Original: Ah, shit...
Key.Chinese: 啊見鬼...
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊见鬼...

Key.Original: Yup, that's what I thought. See you at the RV, clown dick. Out.
Key.Chinese: 好，我就覺得會是這樣。集結點見，王牌小哥。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，我就觉得会是这样。集结点见，臭弟弟。通话完毕。

Container.name: 021_am_win_zulu
Container.situation: player speaks with zulu regarding results of their bet.

Key.Original: Zulu Actual, this is Victor Actual.
Key.Chinese: "祖魯"領隊，這是"維克多"領隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: Zulu 领队，这是 Victor 领队。

Key.Original: I reckon you're outta pocket, over.
Key.Chinese: 我估計你要把錢賠光了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我估计你要把钱赔光了，完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah? You guys bag more than three?
Key.Chinese: 哈?你們的人有幹掉超過三個嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈？你们的人有干掉超过三个吗？

Container.name: 020_ta_win_hq_in
Container.situation: player contacts hq and reports that all enemy armor has been destroyed.

Key.Original: Outstanding! Press home the attack!
Key.Chinese: 幹得好!繼續進攻!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好！继续进攻！

Key.Original: Perhaps we can capture Paros before nightfall. Out.
Key.Chinese: 或許我們能在入夜時分拿下帕羅斯。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 或许我们能在入夜时分拿下帕罗斯。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, it's Victor.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，這是"維克多"。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这是 Victor。

Key.Original: Those tanks? They're history. Over.
Key.Chinese: 那些坦克?它們完蛋了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些坦克？它们完蛋了。完毕。

Container.name: 019_ta_redirect
Container.situation: player is redirected by hq to help zulu.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Zulu, tasking.
Key.Chinese: 明白了，"祖魯"，正分配任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白了，Zulu，正分配任务。

Key.Original: Victor, you read?
Key.Chinese: "維克多"，收到了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor，收到了吗？

Key.Original: Zulu to Papa Bear! We got optics on enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: "祖魯"呼叫Papa Bear!我們目視到敵軍了。
Key.Chinesesimp: Zulu 呼叫 Papa Bear！我们目视到敌军了。

Key.Original: Two tank platoons, heading straight for us, north towards Sofia!
Key.Chinese: 兩個坦克排，逕直向我們開來，向北朝索菲亞來!
Key.Chinesesimp: 两个坦克排，径直向我们开来，向北朝索菲亚来！

Key.Original: Move east and outflank them.
Key.Chinese: 向東機動從側翼打擊他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向东机动从侧翼打击他们。

Key.Original: If they get past us they'll overrun our TOC!
Key.Chinese: 如果他們越過了我們，它們就會幹掉我們的戰術指揮部!
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果他们越过了我们，它们就会干掉我们的战术指挥部！

Key.Original: Whisky 3-1 is coming to you. Link-up, rearm, then, move east and outflank them. Out.
Key.Chinese: Whiskey3-1"朝你們來了。和他們合流，補給彈藥，然後向東機動包抄他們。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Whiskey3-1"朝你们来了。和他们合流，补给弹药，然后向东机动包抄他们。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, sir.
Key.Chinese: 收到，長官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，长官。

Container.name: 018_ta_destroy_aa_complete
Container.situation: player destroys the anti-aircraft battery.

Key.Original: Victor, it's Papa Bear.
Key.Chinese: "維克多"，這是Papa Bear。
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor，这是 Papa Bear。

Key.Original: Nicely done, we just got word: good kill on that AA. Carry on with your primary objective, out.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好，我們剛剛聽說:那輛自行高炮打得好。繼續執行首要任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，我们刚刚听说：那辆自行高炮打得好。继续执行首要任务。通话完毕。

Container.name: 017_ta_destroy_aa_missed
Container.situation: player wastes his maruk missiles and fails to destroy the anti-aircraft battery.

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Victor, that AA's still active - what's taking you so long? Over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear叫"維克多"，那輛自行高炮還沒搞定-怎麼花了這麼久?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 叫 Victor，那辆自行高炮还没搞定—怎么花了这么久？完毕。

Key.Original: Maybe, we'll just have to deal with it some other way. Out.
Key.Chinese: 或許吧，我們可能得用別的什麼方法處理它了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 或许吧，我们可能得用别的什么方法处理它了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Damn, we tried, but, uh, I dunno...
Key.Chinese: 該死，我們試過了，但，呃，我不知道...
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死，我们试过了，但，呃，我不知道...

Key.Original: Bad datalink, maybe?
Key.Chinese: 可能是數據鏈壞了?
Key.Chinesesimp: 可能是数据链坏了？

Container.name: 016_ta_destroy_aa_no_ammo
Container.situation: player acknowledges tdhq's command, but cannot comply asthey are out of ammo.

Key.Original: Never mind, Victor, we'll organize a fire mission. Focus on your primary objective, out.
Key.Chinese: 那算了，"維克多"，我們會組織一次火力任務。注意首要目標吧。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那算了，Victor，我们会组织一次火力任务。注意首要目标吧。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Ah, that's gonna be a problem, Papa Bear, we already used 'em.
Key.Chinese: 啊，那可能有問題。Papa Bear，我們都把導彈用光了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，那可能有问题。Papa Bear，我们都把导弹用光了。

Container.name: 015_ta_destroy_aa_confirmed
Container.situation: player acknowledges tdhq's command.

Key.Original: No problem - we'll see to it, out.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題-我們會看看的，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没问题—我们会看看的，通话完毕。

Container.name: 014_ta_destroy_aa
Container.situation: player is told to destroy an enemy aa battery, using a maruk missile.

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Victor, message, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear叫"維克多"，有信息，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 叫 Victor，有信息，完毕。

Key.Original: There's a situation.
Key.Chinese: 出了點狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 出了点状况。

Key.Original: Special forces have eyes on a Tigris anti-aircraft system outside Delfinaki.
Key.Chinese: 特種部隊在澤爾菲納基城外發現了一輛"底格里斯"防空系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 特种部队在泽尔菲纳基城外发现了一辆"底格里斯"防空系统。

Key.Original: Go ahead, Papa Bear.
Key.Chinese: 說吧，Papa Bear。
Key.Chinesesimp: 说吧，Papa Bear。

Key.Original: They've got it painted with a laser designator.
Key.Chinese: 他們用雷射指示器實施了照射。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们用激光指示器实施了照射。

Key.Original: Lock-on using one of your anti-tank guided missiles and destroy it from a distance, over.
Key.Chinese: 用你的反坦克導彈鎖定並在遠距離上摧毀它，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 用你的反坦克导弹锁定并在远距离上摧毁它，完毕。

Container.name: 013_ta_counterattack_eliminated
Container.situation: hq orders player to move to point yukon.

Key.Original: Copy, great work!
Key.Chinese: 收到，幹得好!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，干得好！

Key.Original: Support Yankee and continue towards Point Yukon.
Key.Chinese: 支援揚基並繼續向育空點前進。
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援 Yankee 并继续向育空点前进。

Key.Original: Victor to Papa Bear, task complete. Over.
Key.Chinese: "維克多"叫Papa Bear，任務完成。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor 叫 Papa Bear，任务完成。完毕。

Key.Original: Load AP rounds, we suspect CSAT may have armor ahead, out.
Key.Chinese: 裝填穿甲彈，我們懷疑前面會遇上廣協同盟的裝甲車輛，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 装填穿甲弹，我们怀疑前面会遇上广协的装甲车辆，通话完毕。

Container.name: 012_ta_counterattack_out
Container.situation: hq instructs player to repel the enemy's attack.

Key.Original: Drive them back, we cannot lose the initiative - Papa Bear, out.
Key.Chinese: 把他們趕回去，我們不能丟掉主動權-Papa Bear，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把他们赶回去，我们不能丢掉主动权-Papa Bear，通话完毕。

Container.name: 011_ta_counterattack_uav
Container.situation: hq informs player about a uav live feed.

Key.Original: Patching through the live feed now.
Key.Chinese: 現在轉接直播畫面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在转接直播画面。

Container.name: 010_ta_counterattack_in
Container.situation: hq provides player with intel on the counterattack.

Key.Original: Yankee, Charlie, Victor. Be advised. Hostile IFVs are advancing from the south-west.
Key.Chinese: "揚基"，Charlie，"維克多"。請注意，敵方步兵戰車正從西南方接近。
Key.Chinesesimp: Yankee，Charlie，Victor。请注意，敌方步兵战车正从西南方接近。

Container.name: 009_ta_spotter_killed
Container.situation: player eliminates the spotter.

Key.Original: Roger! Much obliged, Victor, we owe you one, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到!十分感謝，"維克多"，我們欠你一次，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到！十分感谢，Victor，我们欠你一次，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Victor to Charlie, target neutralized, you're all clear, over.
Key.Chinese: "維克多"叫Charlie，目標消滅，你們安全了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor 叫 Charlie，目标消灭，你们安全了，完毕。

Container.name: 008_eve_player_target
Container.situation: player's tank destroyer becomes target for artillery.

Key.Original: Ah, fuck...
Those mortars have gotta fix on us!
Key.Chinese: 那些迫擊炮是衝我們來的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些迫击炮是冲我们来的！

Container.name: 007_in_spotter_hurry_02
Container.situation: charlie provides player with even more information on the spotter's location.

Key.Original: Jesus Christ, Victor, do you need a fucking zip code?
Key.Chinese: 老天爺啊"維克多"，你特麼的需要郵政編碼嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 老天爷啊 Victor，你特么的需要邮政编码吗？

Key.Original: Switch to thermals, find 'em goats, move down a tad, and there - at the window of the building! Out.
Key.Chinese: 切換到熱成像，找到那些山羊，往下看一點，就在那兒-在建築物的窗口那裡!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换到热成像，找到那些山羊，往下看一点，就在那儿—在建筑物的窗口那里！通话完毕。

Container.name: 006_in_spotter_hurry_01
Container.situation: charlie provides player with more information on the spotter's location.

Key.Original: Victor, what's the hold up? He's at grid 244-231!
Key.Chinese: "維克多"，你還在愣什麼神啊，他在坐標244-231!
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor，你还在愣什么神啊，他在坐标244-231！

Key.Original: There's some goats, top of the hill and just below 'em. Out.
Key.Chinese: 那兒有一些山羊，在山坡頂上，就在他們下面一點。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿有一些山羊，在山坡顶上，就在他们下面一点。通话完毕。

Container.name: 005_ta_player_at_position
Container.situation: charlie radios player with target location of enemy spotter.

Key.Original: Copy, we're in some abandoned farmhouse, just along the tree line!
Key.Chinese: 收到，我們在一些廢棄的農場小屋裡，就在林木線附近!
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，我们在一些废弃的农场小屋里，就在林木线附近！

Key.Original: That spotter's in a building across from us.
Key.Chinese: 觀察員在我們對面的一處建築物裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 观察员在我们对面的一处建筑物里。

Key.Original: Victor to Charlie, update, we're at your location, over.
Key.Chinese: "維克多"叫Charlie，狀況更新，我們在你們的位置上了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Victor 叫 Charlie，状况更新，我们在你们的位置上了，完毕。

Key.Original: I say again, grid 244-231.
Key.Chinese: 我再說一遍，坐標244-231。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我再说一遍，坐标244-231。

Key.Original: It's a small, white cabin with bright blue cornerstones and sheets of corrugated iron on the roof.
Key.Chinese: 那是個小的、白色的小屋，亮藍色的柱石和波浪鋼屋頂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是个小的、白色的小屋，亮蓝色的柱石和波浪钢屋顶。

Key.Original: Just watch your background, there's civilians. Over.
Key.Chinese: 注意你的背景，那裡有平民。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意你的背景，那里有平民。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger, Charlie. Hang on, we'll take care of it, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Charlie。等一下，我們會解決的，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Charlie。等一下，我们会解决的，通话完毕。

Container.name: 004_am_task_update
Container.situation: hq contacts player with task update.

Key.Original: Papa Bear, it's Charlie! Our APC is gone!
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，這是Charlie!我們的裝輸完啦!
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这是 Charlie！我们的装输完啦！

Key.Original: There's accurate mortar fire coming down on our position.
Key.Chinese: 有精確的迫擊炮火力在朝我陣地轟擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有精确的迫击炮火力在朝我阵地轰击。

Key.Original: They gotta have a spotter somewhere nearby.
Key.Chinese: 他們在附近哪裡有個觀察員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们在附近哪里有个观察员。

Key.Original: Requesting artillery support! Over.
Key.Chinese: 請求炮火支援!完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求炮火支援！完毕。

Key.Original: Negative, Charlie.
Key.Chinese: 不行，Charlie。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，Charlie。

Key.Original: That's too big a risk for the local CIVPOP.
Key.Chinese: 那樣的話傷到當地平民的風險太大。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那样的话伤到当地平民的风险太大。

Key.Original: Try to get a bead on the threat and relay to Victor, out.
Key.Chinese: 試著找到威脅然後報告給"維克多"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 试着找到威胁然后报告给 Victor，完毕。

Container.name: 003_in_fcs_repaired
Container.situation: engineer tells player about targeting system and countermeasures.

Key.Original: Sid, it's Ramirez - your FCS.
Key.Chinese: "西德"，這是"拉米瑞茲"-你的火控系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: "西德"，这是"拉米瑞兹"-你的火控系统。

Key.Original: I didn't tell you, we had to replace the panel. Like before, you only need to key the target button.
Key.Chinese: 我沒跟你說，我們得換掉面板。就跟以前一樣，你只要按目標鍵就好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没跟你说，我们得换掉面板。就跟以前一样，你只要按目标键就好了。

Key.Original: Relax, man, we didn't fill 'em with confetti. Out.
Key.Chinese: 放鬆，夥計，我們不會往裡塞碎彩紙的。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放松，伙计，我们不会往里塞碎彩纸的。通话完毕。

Key.Original: And what about my smoke dispensers?
Key.Chinese: 那我的煙霧彈布撒器呢?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那我的烟雾弹布撒器呢？

Container.name: 002_am_player_in_rhino
Container.situation: player gets in tank destroyer.

Key.Original: Copy that.
Key.Chinese: 明白。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白。

Key.Original: Charlie's reporting multiple contacts south of Limnichori.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie's"報告稱在利姆尼霍里以南遭遇多個敵軍接觸
Key.Chinesesimp: Charlie 报告称在利姆尼霍里以南遭遇多个敌军接触

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Victor. Stepping off. Over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，這是"維克多"。出發。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这是 Victor。出发。完毕。

Key.Original: Get there and assist. Slammers from Yankee are also en route. ETA, four mikes. Acknowledge, over.
Key.Chinese: 前去支援。揚基的"重擊者"也已經在路上了，四分鐘。請查收，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前去支援。Yankee 的"重击者"也已经在路上了，四分钟。请查收，完毕。

Key.Original: Got it, we'll hit 'em with a little shock and awe, out.
Key.Chinese: 明白，我們會給他們來點震盪和衝擊的，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白，我们会给他们来点震荡和冲击的，通话完毕。

Container.name: 001_ta_opening_speech
Container.situation: player begins mission. conversation with zulu and engineer ensues.

Key.Original: Yeah, all good, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 耶，都好了，軍士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 耶，都好了，军士。

Key.Original: But, uh, y'know, don't have me bust a gut again.
Key.Chinese: 但，嗯，你知道，別讓我再勞動筋骨了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但，嗯，你知道，别让我再劳动筋骨了。

Key.Original: Hey!
Key.Chinese: 嘿!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿！

Key.Original: How she lookin', Ramirez?
Key.Chinese: 她狀況如何啊，拉米瑞茲?
Key.Chinesesimp: 她状况如何啊，拉米瑞兹？

Key.Original: There's a toolkit in the cargo box.
Key.Chinese: 在貨物箱裡有個工具箱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在货物箱里有个工具箱。

Key.Original: Papa Bear to all callsigns, execute plan Flagstaff, out.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear呼叫全體呼號，執行計劃"弗拉格斯塔夫"，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 呼叫全体呼号，执行计划"旗杆"，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Oh, that's real original.
Key.Chinese: 哦，這可是真開頭了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，这可是真开头了。

Key.Original: You rolling out, Sid? Or you just gonna go out and, er, roll her over?
Key.Chinese: 你要出發了嗎，西德?還是說你只是開出去，呃，遛一圈?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你要出发了吗，西德？还是说你只是开出去，呃，遛一圈？

Key.Original: Last I checked, we're catchin' up on your confirmed kills!
Key.Chinese: 上次我看的時候，我們已經趕上了你的戰績了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 上次我看的时候，我们已经赶上了你的战绩了！

Key.Original: Hell, sure - you're on - we'll take your cash.
Key.Chinese: 呵呵，好吧-你押上了-我們會拿到錢的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呵呵，好吧—你押上了—我们会拿到钱的。

Key.Original: Okay. Forty bucks says we knock out more tanks than you.
Key.Chinese: 好勒。賭四十塊大洋我們比你們敲掉更多的坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好嘞。赌四十块大洋我们比你们敲掉更多的坦克。

Key.Original: Alright. Time to move, let's go get some!
Key.Chinese: 好了。該出發了，我們去給他們點顏色吧!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了。该出发了，我们去给他们点颜色吧！

Key.Original: Camp Alamo
Key.Chinese: 阿拉莫營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿拉莫营地

Key.Original: Proceed to %1Point Yukon%2 and rendezvous with Zulu.
Key.Chinese: 繼續前往%1育空點%2並和"祖魯"回合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续前往%1育空点%2并和 Zulu 回合。

Key.Original: Move to Point Yukon
Key.Chinese: 前往育空點
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往育空点

Key.Original: Special forces have lased an anti-aircraft system near %1Delfinaki%2. Eliminate it with a MARUK missile.
Key.Chinese: 特種部隊用激光瞄準了一輛位於%1澤爾菲納基%2附近的防空系統。用一枚MARUK導彈摧毀它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 特种部队用激光瞄准了一辆位于%1泽尔菲纳基%2附近的防空系统。用一枚 MARUK 导弹摧毁它。

Key.Original: Destroy AA
Key.Chinese: 摧毀自行高炮
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁自行高炮

Key.Original: Take command of your recently repaired %1Rhino MGS UP%2.
Key.Chinese: 接管你剛修好的%1"犀牛"機動火炮系統城市戰型%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接管你刚修好的%1"犀牛"机动火炮系统城市战型%2。

Key.Original: Collect Rhino
Key.Chinese: 接收"犀牛"
Key.Chinesesimp: 接收"犀牛"

Key.Original: Divert south and surprise enemy tanks advancing on %1Sofia%2.
Key.Chinese: 向南轉向並對像%1索菲亞%2開進的敵方坦克發起突然襲擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向南转向并对象%1索菲亚%2开进的敌方坦克发起突然袭击。

Key.Original: Ambush Tanks
Key.Chinese: 伏擊坦克
Key.Chinesesimp: 伏击坦克

Key.Original: Our troops are under accurate artillery fire. Eliminate the enemy spotter at %1grid 244-231%2.
Key.Chinese: 我方部隊遭遇精確的炮兵火力打擊。消滅位於%1坐標244-231%2的敵方觀察員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我方部队遭遇精确的炮兵火力打击。消灭位于%1坐标244-231%2的敌方观察员。

Key.Original: Neutralize Spotter
Key.Chinese: 消滅觀察員
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭观察员

Key.Original: Meet with Whisky 3-1 and rearm.
Key.Chinese: 和Whiskey3-1"會面並補充彈藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 和 Whiskey3-1"会面并补充弹药。

Key.Original: Rearm
Key.Chinese: 補充彈藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 补充弹药

Key.Original: All friendly armor has been destroyed! Save your vehicle and withdraw to the %1staging area%2.
Key.Chinese: 所有的友軍裝甲車輛都被摧毀了!保存你的車輛並撤往%1集結地域%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有的友军装甲车辆都被摧毁了！保存你的车辆并撤往%1集结地域%2。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Your vehicle was destroyed! Withdraw to the %1staging area%2.
Key.Chinese: 你的車輛被摧毀了!撤回%1集結地域%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的车辆被摧毁了！撤回%1集结地域%2。

Key.Original: Retreat
Key.Chinese: 撤退
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退

Key.Original: Enemy forces are pushing north-east from %1Nidasos%2. Hold the line and repel their offensive.
Key.Chinese: 敵方部隊正從%1尼達索斯%2向東北方推進。守住防線並粉碎其攻勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌方部队正从%1尼达索斯%2向东北方推进。守住防线并粉碎其攻势。

Key.Original: Stop Counterattack
Key.Chinese: 粉碎反衝擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 粉碎反冲击

Key.Original: Move up and assist Charlie, just %1south%2 of Limnichori.
Key.Chinese: 機動並支援Charlie，就在利姆尼霍里%1以南%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 机动并支援 Charlie，就在利姆尼霍里%1以南%2。

Key.Original: Support Infantry
Key.Chinese: 支援步兵
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援步兵

Key.Original: Tank Destroyers
Key.Chinese: 坦克殲擊車
Key.Chinesesimp: 坦克歼击车

Key.Original:
1.Take command of your recently repaired Rhino MGS.
2. Move south-west with %3Charlie%2 and %4Yankee%2 and eliminate any hostiles you encounter.
3. Rendezvous with %5Zulu%2 at Point %6Brazos%2.
Key.Chinese:
1. 接管你剛剛修好的"犀牛"機動火炮系統城市戰型。
2. 和%3Charlie%2和%4"揚基"%2一起向西南開進，消滅你所遭遇的敵人。
3. 在%6布拉索斯點%2和%5"祖魯"%2匯合。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 接管你刚刚修好的"犀牛"机动火炮系统城市战型。
2. 和%3Charlie%2和%4Yankee%2一起向西南开进，消灭你所遭遇的敌人。
3. 在%6布拉索斯点%2和%5Zulu%2汇合。

Key.Original: Point Brazos
Key.Chinese: 布拉索斯點
Key.Chinesesimp: 布拉索斯点

Key.Original: Point Yukon
Key.Chinese: 育空點
Key.Chinesesimp: 育空点

Key.Original: Thanks to your efforts, we've consolidated our grip on the north east of the island and can now make a move on Paros. Excellent job!
Key.Chinese: 多虧你的努力，我們得以加強對島嶼東北部的控制，現在可以向帕羅斯推進了。幹得好!
Key.Chinesesimp: 多亏你的努力，我们得以加强对岛屿东北部的控制，现在可以向帕罗斯推进了。干得好！

Key.Original: Mission complete
Key.Chinese: 任務完成
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成

Key.Original: Your tank destroyer was wrecked! Thankfully, you managed to withdraw to the staging area.
Key.Chinese: 你的坦克殲擊車報廢了!謝天謝地，你成功撤回了集結地域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的坦克歼击车报废了！谢天谢地，你成功撤回了集结地域。

Key.Original: Rhino was lost
Key.Chinese: 犀牛損失
Key.Chinesesimp: 犀牛损失

Key.Original: Your tank destroyer was wrecked! Thankfully, you managed to regroup with a friendly unit.
Key.Chinese: 你的坦克殲擊車報廢了!謝天謝地，你成功和友軍單位回合了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的坦克歼击车报废了！谢天谢地，你成功和友军单位回合了。

Key.Original: Rhino was lost
Key.Chinese: 犀牛損失
Key.Chinesesimp: 犀牛损失

Key.Original: Almost all of our armored assets have been destroyed! The north eastern front is lost and our enemy will take great confidence in our defeat.
Key.Chinese: 幾乎全部的我方裝甲單位全都被摧毀了!東北戰線已經陷落，敵方將從我之失敗中汲取強有力的信心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几乎全部的我方装甲单位全都被摧毁了！东北战线已经陷落，敌方将从我之失败中汲取强有力的信心。

Key.Original: Attack failed
Key.Chinese: 攻擊失敗
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击失败

Key.Original: Your tank destroyer ran out of fuel!
Key.Chinese: 你的坦克殲擊車沒燃料了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的坦克歼击车没燃料了！

Key.Original: Rhino Damaged
Key.Chinese: 犀牛受損
Key.Chinesesimp: 犀牛受损

Key.Original: Tank Destroyers
Key.Chinese: 坦克殲擊車
Key.Chinesesimp: 坦克歼击车

Key.Original: Take control of a tank destroyer and go head-to-head with enemy armor on the battlefield.
Key.Chinese: 操縱一輛坦克殲擊車在戰場上和敵方裝甲部隊正面對決。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操纵一辆坦克歼击车在战场上和敌方装甲部队正面对决。

Key.Original: Push south-west towards %2Nidasos%1, neutralize armored threats, and support friendly forces in a combined arms offensive.
Key.Chinese: 向西南方的%2尼達索斯%1推進，消除裝甲威脅，並支援友軍部隊遂行諸兵種合同進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: 向西南方的%2尼达索斯%1推进，消除装甲威胁，并支援友军部队遂行诸兵种合同进攻。

Key.Original: Camp Alamo, Molos Airfield, North East Altis
Key.Chinese: 阿拉莫營地，莫洛斯機場，阿爾蒂斯東北部
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿拉莫营地，莫洛斯机场，阿尔蒂斯东北部

Key.Original: %3Papa Bear%2 - HQ%1%4Victor%2 - Your team%1%5Yankee%2 - Armored platoon%1%6Charlie%2 - Mechanized infantry squad%1%7Zulu%2 - Armored platoon%1%8Nomad%2 - Armored platoon%1%9Whisky%2 - Resupply Group
Key.Chinese: %3Papa Bear%2-指揮部%1%4"維克多"%2-你的小組%1%5"揚基"%2-裝甲排%1%6Charlie%2-機械化步兵班%1%7"祖魯"%2-裝甲排%1%8"遊牧民"%2-裝甲排%1%9Whiskey%2-補給群
Key.Chinesesimp: %3Papa Bear%2-指挥部%1%4Victor%2-你的小组%1%5Yankee%2-装甲排%1%6Charlie%2-机械化步兵班%1%7Zulu%2-装甲排%1%8"游牧民"%2-装甲排%1%9Whiskey%2-补给群

Key.Original: Take control of a tank destroyer and go head-to-head with enemy armor on the battlefield.
Key.Chinese: 操縱一輛坦克殲擊車在戰場上和敵方裝甲部隊正面對決。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操纵一辆坦克歼击车在战场上和敌方装甲部队正面对决。

Key.Original: Having secured a foothold earlier today on the %2Eastern Penninsula%1, we are now poised to push farther south, towards the city of %3Paros%1. %17%17The enemy's %4defensive line%1, east of the %5main airport%1, is still our main objective. If we can exploit their positions %6here%1, they'll be forced to respond, splitting their forces to fight on two fronts. %17%17Our close air support has already wreaked some havoc. The %7radar station%1 and %8military base%1 in the area have both been destroyed - but armored threats remain, particularly in places with a high risk of civilian casualties. %17%17MBTs from %9Zulu%1 then, will advance south, parallel to the %10main highway%1, while callsigns %11Charlie%1 and %12Yankee%1, with a supporting tank destroyer from %13Victor%1, will move in tandem along our western flank, down through the forest valley, towards %15Point Yukon%1, avoiding the hybrid minefield, %18located here%1. %17%17Once we've broken through, all elements will continue to %16Point Brazos%1, where we will begin the second phase of the operation.
Key.Chinese: 在今日早先在%2東部半島%1奪取一處支撐點後，我方當前將堅決向南推進，向%3帕羅斯%1城進攻。 %17%17位於%5主機場%1以東的敵之%4防線%1仍為我之主要目標。倘若我能在%6此處%1向其陣地發展，敵將被迫做出響應，將其兵力分散於兩條戰線上。 %17%17我近距離空中支援已起到一些效用。該地區之%7雷達站%1和%8軍事基地%1已均遭摧毀-但敵之裝甲威脅依然健在，尤其在易造成高昂平民傷亡之地區之敵仍較強。 %17%17來自%9"祖魯"%1之主戰坦克將向南，平行於%10主要高速路%1實施推進，而呼號%11Charlie%1和%12"揚基"%1，在來自%13"維克多"%1的一輛坦克殲擊車之支援下，將以縱隊沿左翼前進，向南穿越森林峽谷，向%15育空點%1推進，規避%18位於此處%1之混合雷場。 %17%17一旦我方得以達成突破，全分隊將繼續向%16布拉索斯%1點推進，在此我方將準備第二階段行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在今日早先在%2东部半岛%1夺取一处支撑点后，我方当前将坚决向南推进，向%3帕罗斯%1城进攻。 %17%17位于%5主机场%1以东的敌之%4防线%1仍为我之主要目标。倘若我能在%6此处%1向其阵地发展，敌将被迫做出响应，将其兵力分散于两条战线上。 %17%17我近距离空中支援已起到一些效用。该地区之%7雷达站%1和%8军事基地%1已均遭摧毁-但敌之装甲威胁依然健在，尤其在易造成高昂平民伤亡之地区之敌仍较强。 %17%17来自%9Zulu%1之主战坦克将向南，平行于%10主要高速路%1实施推进，而呼号%11Charlie%1和%12Yankee%1，在来自%13Victor%1的一辆坦克歼击车之支援下，将以纵队沿左翼前进，向南穿越森林峡谷，向%15育空点%1推进，规避%18位于此处%1之混合雷场。 %17%17一旦我方得以达成突破，全分队将继续向%16布拉索斯%1点推进，在此我方将准备第二阶段行动。

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: TANK DESTROYERS - Cannon-launched AT Guided Missiles, Armored Vehicle Interiors, Improved Firing Control Systems
Key.Chinese: 演示任務:坦克殲擊車-炮射反坦克導彈，裝甲車輛內構，改良的火控系統
Key.Chinesesimp: 演示任务：坦克歼击车—炮射反坦克导弹，装甲车辆内构，改良的火控系统

Key.Original: Hold the highest score before the mission time expires.
Key.Chinese: 在任務時間結束前保持最高分數。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在任务时间结束前保持最高分数。

Key.Original: Eliminate all opponents.
Key.Chinese: 消滅所有對手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭所有对手。

Key.Original: Transport the device to your FOB by truck.
Key.Chinese: 將裝置用卡車運往你的前進作戰基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将装置用卡车运往你的前进作战基地。

Key.Original: * Points are also allocated for killing enemies.
Key.Chinese: *殺敵也能得到分數。
Key.Chinesesimp: *杀敌也能得到分数。

Key.Original:
Secure Device
* It is possible to win the mission and secure the device by eliminating opposing players. Consider your strength and adjust your plans accordingly.
Key.Chinese:
控制裝置
*是有可能通過消滅所有敵人來贏得任務並控制裝置的。考慮你的力量並據此調整計劃。
Key.Chinesesimp:
控制装置
*是有可能通过消灭所有敌人来赢得任务并控制装置的。考虑你的力量并据此调整计划。

Key.Original: * Be pro-active and stay on the move. Time is of the essence. A significant number of points are awarded to the team that first loads the device onto a truck.
Key.Chinese: *保持積極主動並持續移動。時間特別寶貴。第一組把裝置裝上卡車的團隊會得到特別多的分數獎勵。
Key.Chinesesimp: *保持积极主动并持续移动。时间特别宝贵。第一组把装置装上卡车的团队会得到特别多的分数奖励。

Key.Original:
Locate Device
* Be sure to check your map for regular updates on the device's position.
* Move with caution inside the expected landing zone, there is a strong possibility enemies will be active there.
* Consider the risk of dividing your forces. On the one hand, you can cover more ground and increase the chances of retrieving the device quickly. On the other, players are more vulnerable in smaller numbers.
* Ensure a truck is ready to transport the device to safety; remember though, that such vehicles are priority targets for opposing teams.
Key.Chinese:
定位裝置
*要確保經常檢查地圖以獲取對裝置位置的定期更新。
*小心進入預計的降落地點，那裡很可能有強大的敵方力量。
*認真考慮分兵的後果。一方面，你可能可以覆蓋更多的區域並增加快速回收裝置的可能性;一方面，玩家在人數較少的情況下更容易遭到殺傷。
*確保卡車已經準備好把裝置運往安全區域;記住此類車輛是對方團隊的優先目標。
Key.Chinesesimp:
定位装置
*要确保经常检查地图以获取对装置位置的定期更新。
*小心进入预计的降落地点，那里很可能有强大的敌方力量。
*认真考虑分兵的后果。一方面，你可能可以覆盖更多的区域并增加快速回收装置的可能性;一方面，玩家在人数较少的情况下更容易遭到杀伤。
*确保卡车已经准备好把装置运往安全区域;记住此类车辆是对方团队的优先目标。

Key.Original:
Briefing Phase
* Communication is key. Once a team leader has been assigned, listen carefully to their instructions and work together to accomplish objectives.
* Draw lines on the map to communicate strategies and plans to other players on your team. Hold down the Left Ctrl button while viewing the map and draw a line by using the Left Mouse Button with cursor motion. To remove a line or marker you have placed, move the cursor to it and press Delete.
* Only select weapons and equipment appropriate for the mission or your role within it.
Key.Chinese:
簡報階段
*通訊是關鍵。一旦團隊領導被確定，就要在仔細聽他們的介紹，團結一致來完成目標。
*和你團隊的其他玩家通過在地圖上劃線來交流戰略和計劃。在看地圖時按住左Ctrl鍵並按住鼠標左鍵劃線。要移除一條線或一個標記，把光標對準它，按Delete鍵。
*只選擇適合你的任務或你職責所在的武器和裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp:
简报阶段
*通信是关键。一旦团队领导被确定，就要在仔细听他们的介绍，团结一致来完成目标。
*和你团队的其他玩家通过在地图上划线来交流战略和计划。在看地图时按住左 Ctrl 键并按住鼠标左键划线。要移除一条线或一个标记，把光标对准它，按 Delete 键。
*只选择适合你的任务或你职责所在的武器和装备。

Key.Original: SECURE DEVICE
Key.Chinese: 控制裝置
Key.Chinesesimp: 控制装置

Key.Original: Your map will update every %1 minutes, as the area of the expected dropzone diminishes.
Key.Chinese: 隨著預計降落區的逐漸縮小，你的地圖會每隔%1分鐘更新一次。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着预计降落区的逐渐缩小，你的地图会每隔%1分钟更新一次。

Key.Original: LOCATE DEVICE
Key.Chinese: 確認裝置位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认装置位置

Key.Original: * As a team, hold the highest collective score before the mission time expires.
Key.Chinese: *作為一個團隊，在時間耗盡之前取得最高分數。
Key.Chinesesimp: *作为一个团队，在时间耗尽之前取得最高分数。

Key.Original: Victory Conditions
Key.Chinese: 勝利條件
Key.Chinesesimp: 胜利条件

Key.Original:
Scoring
Points are awarded per side as follows:
+ %1 for the first side who successfully loads the device onto a truck.
+ %2 for every opponent killed.
+ %3 for every %4 seconds the device is loaded in a truck with at least one friendly unit inside.
Key.Chinese:
得分
分數根據以下原則被授予各方:
第一方首次成功將裝置裝上卡車，加%1分。
每擊斃一名對手，加%2分。
在裝置被裝上至少有一名己方單位在內的卡車後每%4秒加%3分。
Key.Chinesesimp:
得分
分数根据以下原则被授予各方：
第一方首次成功将装置装上卡车，加%1分。
每击毙一名对手，加%2分。
在装置被装上至少有一名己方单位在内的卡车后每%4秒加%3分。

Key.Original: Disabled. If you would like to play with AI, you must enable them in the mission parameters
Key.Chinese: 已關閉。如果你想跟AI一起玩，你必須在遊戲參數中啟動他們
Key.Chinesesimp: 已关闭。如果你想跟 AI 一起玩，你必须在游戏参数中启动他们

Key.Original:
Team Leaders
Each side may have one player in command. Their role is to supervise the mission, allocating tasks and waypoints.
* Individual players may request or relinquish the command role by pressing and holding %1
* If two or more players wish to be team leaders, the player with the highest rank will be selected.
* If there are a number of players with the same rank who want the role, priority will be given to the player who requested the position first.
* If the mission begins without a commander, the first player to volunteer will automatically be chosen, regardless of their rank.
* Should a team leader be killed in action, the role will be given to a player who has logged their interest. Precedence will be given according to rank. If no other players are waiting, the position will be open.
* To create tasks as a team leader, press %2 to view the map and select friendly units by either clicking the left-mouse button on them or clicking it and dragging your cursor across them. You will see these units have been highlighted. Next, click the left-mouse button once more to place a task for the units selected. By default, tasks are labelled MOVE, but more appropriate task titles can be found by right clicking on the created task.
Key.Chinese:
團隊領導
每一方會有一名玩家擔任指揮。他們的職責是監督任務的執行，分配任務和路徑點。
*每一名玩家都可以通過按%1要求或放棄擔任指揮職責。
*如果兩名或更多玩家同時想當領導，那麼軍銜最高的玩家會被選中。
*如果有一些軍銜相同的玩家向擔任這一職責，優先權會被交給首先提出申請的玩家。
*如果任務在開始時沒有指揮，那麼第一名自願擔任的玩家會被自動選取，不論軍銜。
*如果團隊領導陣亡，職責會被交給曾提出擔當意願的玩家。優先權順位將根據軍銜排序。如果沒有玩家在等待，那麼該只為將會保持開放。
*作為團隊領導如果要創造任務，按%2來瀏覽地圖，通過要麼點擊左鍵選取、要麼拖動光標框住友軍單位來選擇他們。你會看到這些單位被標注高亮了。接下來，再向另一個地方點擊鼠標左鍵以為選定單位放置目標。在默認情況下，目標會被標注為"移動"，不過通過右鍵點選被創建的任務可以選擇更適當的任務名稱。
Key.Chinesesimp:
团队领导
每一方会有一名玩家担任指挥。他们的职责是监督任务的执行，分配任务和路径点。
*每一名玩家都可以通过按%1要求或放弃担任指挥职责。
*如果两名或更多玩家同时想当领导，那么军衔最高的玩家会被选中。
*如果有一些军衔相同的玩家向担任这一职责，优先权会被交给首先提出申请的玩家。
*如果任务在开始时没有指挥，那么第一名自愿担任的玩家会被自动选取，不论军衔。
*如果团队领导阵亡，职责会被交给曾提出担当意愿的玩家。优先权顺位将根据军衔排序。如果没有玩家在等待，那么该只为将会保持开放。
*作为团队领导如果要创造任务，按%2来浏览地图，通过要么点击左键选取、要么拖动光标框住友军单位来选择他们。你会看到这些单位被标注高亮了。接下来，再向另一个地方点击鼠标左键以为选定单位放置目标。在默认情况下，目标会被标注为"移动"，不过通过右键点选被创建的任务可以选择更适当的任务名称。

Key.Original: The device is in the air and will arrive by parachute. The dropzone, represented by the circle on your map, will decrease by increments as the mission progresses. All sides receive updates, revealing the location or expected location of the objective. Cooperate with team members and use the vehicles available to complete the mission.
Key.Chinese: 裝置正處於空中，會使用降落傘投放。降落區在你的地圖上以圓圈形式顯示，會隨著任務推進而不斷縮小。各方都會收到關於目標裝置位置或預期位置的信息更新。和團隊成員協作，利用可用的車輛來完成任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 装置正处于空中，会使用降落伞投放。降落区在你的地图上以圆圈形式显示，会随着任务推进而不断缩小。各方都会收到关于目标装置位置或预期位置的信息更新。和团队成员协作，利用可用的车辆来完成任务。

Key.Original:
Individual players are allocated a finite number of AI team mates.
If you are killed in action, you may assume control of one of your subordinates. These supporting units are divided evenly between players. However, if this is not possible, they will be allocated according to rank. Higher-ranking players will then benefit from any surplus figure.
Key.Chinese:
每一名玩家可以配屬數量有限的AI玩家。
如果你在戰鬥中陣亡，你可能可以接管一名你的下屬的控制權。這些支援單位被在玩家中平均分配。然而，如果不能平均分配，那麼就會按照軍銜分配。高軍銜的玩家會得到更多的剩餘資源。
Key.Chinesesimp:
每一名玩家可以配属数量有限的 AI 玩家。
如果你在战斗中阵亡，你可能可以接管一名你的下属的控制权。这些支援单位被在玩家中平均分配。然而，如果不能平均分配，那么就会按照军衔分配。高军衔的玩家会得到更多的剩余资源。

Key.Original: The situation however, is complicated. A cipher protects the cargo and updates every %1 minutes. If we can't recover it within the allocated time, we may fail our mission.

Key.Original: Opposing sides with armored assets clash in a mission to secure a top-secret device.
Key.Chinese: 擁有裝甲力量的對陣雙方在任務中爭奪絕密裝置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拥有装甲力量的对阵双方在任务中争夺绝密装置。

Key.Original: Opposing sides with limited assets clash in a mission to secure a top-secret device.
Key.Chinese: 擁有有限力量的對陣雙方在任務中爭奪絕密裝置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拥有有限力量的对阵双方在任务中争夺绝密装置。

Key.Original: Opposing sides with lightly armored assets clash in a mission to secure a top-secret device.
Key.Chinese: 擁有輕裝甲力量的對陣雙方在任務中爭奪絕密裝置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拥有轻装甲力量的对阵双方在任务中争夺绝密装置。

Key.Original: Opposing sides with heavily armored assets clash in a mission to secure a top-secret device.
Key.Chinese: 擁有重裝甲力量的對陣雙方在任務中爭奪絕密裝置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拥有重装甲力量的对阵双方在任务中争夺绝密装置。

Key.Original: * Eliminate all opponents.
Key.Chinese: *消滅所有對手。
Key.Chinesesimp: *消灭所有对手。

Key.Original: * Transport the device to your Forward Operating Base (FOB) by loading it onto a truck.
Key.Chinese: *通過將裝置裝上一輛卡車來將其運輸到你的前進作戰基地(FOB)。
Key.Chinesesimp: *通过将装置装上一辆卡车来将其运输到你的前进作战基地（FOB）。

Key.Original: Decide whether to follow roads or chart new routes in a set of trials using armored vehicles. These challenges allow you to decide what obstacles to avoid and what shortcuts to take. Use the great mobility afforded by these steel beasts!
Key.Chinese: 使用新的裝甲車輛，決定是要沿著公路還是在通幽小徑中開闢新的道路。這些挑戰允許你決定躲開那些障礙，如何抄近路。最大化地利用這些鋼甲猛獸的機動性!
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用新的装甲车辆，决定是要沿着公路还是在通幽小径中开辟新的道路。这些挑战允许你决定躲开那些障碍，如何抄近路。最大化地利用这些钢甲猛兽的机动性！

Key.Original: Tanks
Key.Chinese: 坦克
Key.Chinesesimp: 坦克

Key.Original: Master on and off road Nyx mobility by setting record lap times around the mountainside town of Abdera.
Key.Chinese: 通過環繞山間小城阿布德拉的計時賽掌控"夜神"的路上和越野能力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过环绕山间小城阿布德拉的计时赛掌控"夜神"的路上和越野能力。

Key.Chinese: TT16
Key.Chinesesimp: TT16

Key.Original: TT16: Weasel Run
Key.Chinese: TT16:鼬鼠奔跑
Key.Chinesesimp: TT16：鼬鼠奔跑

Key.Original: Charge your Rhino down Mont Chauve and get it delivered to the airport as quickly as possible for airlift to the next event.
Key.Chinese: 駕駛你的"犀牛"衝下禿山並以最快速度將其投送到機場以便空運到下一個戰區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶你的"犀牛"冲下秃山并以最快速度将其投送到机场以便空运到下一个战区。

Key.Original: TT17: Shipping and Handling
Key.Chinese: TT17:運輸和處理
Key.Chinesesimp: TT17：运输和处理

Key.Original: Roll into honored tank commander Lt. Robert Hammer's tracks and trace his famed test of courage during the Malden Islands Crisis.
Key.Chinese: 沿著知名坦克車長羅伯特·哈默中尉的軌跡，追隨他在馬爾登群島危機期間對勇氣的試煉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 沿着知名坦克车长罗伯特·哈默中尉的轨迹，追随他在马尔登群岛危机期间对勇气的试炼。
